page.content: 4. Finance (i) Current Financial Position Current A/C-Â£0.55 Deposit A/C-Â£627.02 (ii) Estimated Expenditure and Precept for 1985/86 5. Play leadership scheme 6. Corby Glen enterprise trust limited 7. NHS prescription drugs 8. Any other business 9. Annual public meeting 10. Dates of meetings for rest of year {LOCAL CONCERNS { }Much concern has been expressed at the amount of chemical spray being used on the land and its effects upon the population. Water supplies are becoming contaminated by high nitrate levels. Low flying aircraft from nearby RAF and USAF bases constantly cross the area, causing noise problems.
